FinancialRecord - Class in com.hexaware.payxpert.model
The FinancialRecord class represents a financial record associated with an employee.

Default constructor for the FinancialRecord class.

Parameterized constructor to create a FinancialRecord with specific details.
FinancialRecordDao - Class in com.hexaware.payxpert.dao
The FinancialRecordDao class provides methods to interact with the database for Financial Record-related operations, such as retrieving records by ID, by employee ID, and for a specific date.

Constructs a FinancialRecordDao object with the default database connection.

Constructs a FinancialRecordDao object with the specified database connection.

FinancialRecordException - Exception Class in com.hexaware.payxpert.exception
The FinancialRecordException class is a runtime exception that indicates an exceptional situation related to financial records.
